kind of a funny early one but I think a lot of the hurdles were really around

one thing that's super important and how we do that is we've really heavily invested in our customer success team so
we have about 150 people on the team on the team in New York and we have about
250 people on the team out in Columbus Ohio which is where most of our customer
service takes place and not only do we encourage our customers to reach out to us about

kind is when we are not serving them well enough with the the toys or treats

of boxes that we said today we ship over a hundred and seventeen thousand
different custom boxes to our set of customers and that's because we're trying to listen and basically not give
